statements: SELECT name, position FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_start > '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_start < '2022-03-15 16:00:00' AND shift_end > '2022-03-15 20:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, position, name FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY position DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, position FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_start >= '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND shift_end <= '2022-01-01 17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employee_schedule ORDER BY shift_start ASC, shift_end DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM employee_schedule WHERE shift_start < '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT name, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id WHERE work_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT work_date, start_time, end_time FROM work_hours WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Developer' AND employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT employee_id, date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeSchedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, position FROM Employee WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_id, date, hours_worked FROM WorkingHours WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM WorkingHours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedule WHERE date = '2023-04-15';
SELECT e.employee_name, w.hours_worked FROM Employee e JOIN WorkingHours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id ORDER BY w.hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT shift_date, shift_type FROM shifts WHERE shift_type = 'Morning';
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, schedule_details FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_role='Manager';
SELECT employee_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id;
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_details FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hours_worked FROM employees JOIN working_hours ON employees.employee_id = working_hours.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, shift_date FROM shifts ORDER BY employee_id ASC, shift_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees ORDER BY position;
SELECT employee_id, name, start_date FROM employees WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE date>=CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT position_id, title FROM positions ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.name, p.title, d.name FROM employees e JOIN positions p ON e.position = p.title JOIN departments d ON p.department = d.name;
SELECT e.name, SUM(wh.hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM employees e JOIN working_hours wh ON e.employee_id = wh.employee_id GROUP BY e.name;
SELECT e.name, s.date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM employees e JOIN schedules s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY s.date DESC, s.start_time ASC;
